class.name: tuw/AirSkinNodelet
class.description: This nodelet manages the airskin hardware

class.name: tuw/AirSkinControlNodelet
class.description: This nodelet is used to control the vehicle based on airskin msgs

class.name: tuw/AirSkinColorNodelet
class.description: This nodelet is used to change the airskin colour based on airskin msgs
